titleStmt.title: Greenes vision vvritten at the instant of his death. Conteyning a penitent passion for the folly of his pen.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By E. Allde] for Thomas Newman, and are to be sould at his shop in Fleetestreete, in Saint Dunstons Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: "To the gentleman readers" signed: Robert Greene.
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
The first leaf is blank except for large signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
